loc.title: loc
loc.description: The location of where the spawner group is. This is the location that is used for detection of players nearby.

mob.title: mob
mob.description: The mob to spawn from this Spawner Group. This has to be the Mob's ID, and is case-sensitive.

spawn.title: spawn
spawn.description: The method and places for how the mobs spawn, using either a Radius or a defined list of location vectors

oneOf.title: Radius
oneOf.description: Spawns a number of mobs in a radius

amount.title: amount
amount.description: The amount of mobs to spawn.

radius.title: radius
radius.description: The radius that the mobs spawn.

oneOf.title: Locations
oneOf.description: The list of Locations to spawn this mob.

spawnRate.title: spawnRate
spawnRate.description: This is in SECONDS. Group spawnrates are independent of each other.

sitting.title: sitting
sitting.description: Toggle on/off to determine whether the mob is sitting on the ground or not.

wanderSpeed.title: wanderSpeed
wanderSpeed.description: Number = the speed multiplier of the mob while wandering

wanderRadius.title: wanderRadius
wanderRadius.description: The radius which the mob wanders in

path.title: path
path.description: The path the mob walks using location vectors. The mob will walk to each location in order. When it reaches the last location, it will walk the path in reverse, and repeat. There needs to be at least 2 Path Points in order for this to function. Using paths will override wandering by default.

items.title: Path Point
items.description: A path point to walk to.

pathSpeed.title: pathSpeed
pathSpeed.description: The speed that the mob walks along the Path. Will only work if the Path property is in use
